column4: Can anyone help with a wubi instalation that errors out after a reboot?
depends on the error of course
if you type 'rei' then hit TAB, what happens?
didn't seem like you knew how to do that
other than installing ubuntu manually... well, from a disk, any suggestions?
you don't want to do an ordinary install?
probably has more to do with your Windows installation than wubi itself
why not do a normal install
you said that earlier... and I'm not sure I understand what you mean
you can install Ubuntu to a dedicated partition or two instead of via Wubi (to a file)
or you could go buy another disk
